name: Smoked Salmon Carpaccio
description: Thinly sliced smoked salmon, topped with red onion, capers and a lemon dressing.

name: Chicken Cacciatore
description: Breaded chicken breasts in a hearty, rustic stew. With vegitables and simmered in a tomato sauce rich with wine and herbs

name: Beef Lasagna
description: Layers of pasta, filled with a rich and tender ground beef, marinated in a herbal tomato sauce

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: A rich chocolate cake, with a molten chocolate center, served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream
